僃字的基本解释

僃
bèi
古同“备”。

僃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bèi］
［《廣韻》平秘切，去至，並。］
亦作“俻1”。亦作“偹1”。“僃1”的今字。“备1”的繁体字。
(1)完备；齐备。
(2)储备。
(3)准备；预备。
(4)防备；戒备。
(5)设备；装备。
(6)指长兵器。
(7)后墙。
(8)充任；充当。常用作谦词。
(9)引申为作为。
(10)周遍；周至。
(11)皆；尽。
(12)滿；满足。
(13)富足。
(14)美好。
(15)通“赔”。赔偿。
(16)通“服”。

僃字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　僃； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页115第18
【集韻】同備。

僃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
僃字的起名意思

暂无。

僃
Basic explanation of words
僃
bèi
Ancient with "preparation."
僃
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bèi］
["Guangyun" Ping secret cut, go to, and. ]
Also known as "俻1". Also known as "偹1". The present character of "僃1". Traditional characters for "备1".
(1) Complete; complete.
(2) Reserve.
(3) Preparation; preparation.
(4) Precaution; alert.
(5) Equipment; equipment.
(6) Refers to long weapons.
(7) Back wall.
(8) Serve as; act as. Often used as a modest word.
(9) The extension is deed.
(10) Zhoubian; Zhouzhi.
(11) All; all.
(12) Full; satisfied.
(13) Abundance.
(14) Beautiful.
(15) Through "compensation". Compensation.
(16) Through "service".
